title: Interisland transportation and possession of wild or feral deer prohibited
context: [ยง183D-52] Interisland transportation and possession of wild or feral deer prohibited. No person shall intentionally, knowingly, or recklessly possess, transfer, transport, or release after transport through interisland movement any live wild or feral deer unless permitted by the department or other department of the State. [L 2012, c 144, ยง2]
